<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Guards of Absalom](/Articles.aspx?ID=22)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 60</row>

Learn the ins and outs of each of Absalom's diverse guard precincts, from the chivalric Sally Guard to the notoriously corrupt Token Guard.
name: Guards of Absalom
